entry.title: "It's a fundamental truism that when you engage the people that you're making laws and decisions about, you get better governance, you get better decision making." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from the Heart Watc
entry.content: "It's a fundamental truism that when you engage the people that you're making laws and decisions about, you get better governance, you get better decision making." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from the Heart Watch the full video answering your questions on the Voice to Parliament on our Youtube channel. #auspol #voicetoparliament

entry.title: It's time to face up to the reality that as one of the lowest taxed countries in the developed world, Australia lacks the solid revenue base to deliver all the programs needed for a fair society. We need a tax system that fits Australia's needs. #auspol
entry.content: It's time to face up to the reality that as one of the lowest taxed countries in the developed world, Australia lacks the solid revenue base to deliver all the programs needed for a fair society. We need a tax system that fits Australia's needs. #auspol Earlybird tickets for our Revenue Summit 2023 are on sale now! We're bringing economists and taxation experts together to discuss sensible revenue-raising options to meet Australia's spending needs. ðŸ“… Friday, 27 October, Canberra. Tickets and info via link in bo.

entry.title: "PWC misused government information to help some of its multinational corporations potentially evade taxes. "These groups have become embedded in the ordinary processes of government." - Democracy & Accountability Director Bill Browne #auspol
